sources.title: Dutch Treat (1956)
sources.description: Casper, the always friendly and friend-seeking ghost, is in Holland where little Hans is a willing playmate as he does his chores. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/dutch-treat-1956/

metadata.Plot: Casper, the always friendly and friend-seeking ghost, is in Holland where little Hans is a willing playmate as he does his chores. They spot a hole in the dike which Hans tries to plug with his finger while Casper goes for help, but all of the adults are afraid of him. Just as the dike breaks, Casper covers the hole with a glass-window, stops the potential flood and gives the town an aquarium in the process.
metadata.Actors: Jack Mercer, Mae Questel, Cecil Roy
